mapper.select: SELECT A.STDR_YM AS stdrYm /* 기준년월 */ , A.FND_RPTS_TP_DCD AS fndRptsTpDcd /* 펀드보고서유형구분코드 */ , A.RGST_DT AS rgstDt /* 등록일자 */ , A.DCSN_DT AS dcsnDt /* 확정일자 */ , A.DCSN_YN AS dcsnYn /* 확정여부 */ , A.RGST_EMPNO AS rgstEmpno /* 등록사원번호 */ , A.DCSN_RGST_EMPNO AS dcsnRgstEmpno /* 확정등록사원번호 */ , A.HND_DETL_DTM AS hndDetlDtm /* 조작상세일시 */ , A.HND_EMPNO AS hndEmpno /* 조작사원번호 */ , A.HND_TMNL_NO AS hndTmnlNo /* 조작단말기번호 */ , A.HND_TR_ID AS hndTrId /* 조작거래ID */ , A.GUID AS guid /* GUID */ , B.DPRT_CD AS dprtCd /* 부서코드 */ FROM IBIMS704B A LEFT JOIN IBIMS003B B ON A.HND_EMPNO = B.EMPNO WHERE A.HND_EMPNO = B.EMPNO AND A.STDR_YM LIKE #{stdrYm};
